title: User Complains About Poor Recommendations
description: A long-time user of a streaming service complains that their content recommendations are irrelevant.

tasks.description: Retrieve the user's viewing history and their currently recommended content list.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accesses the user's profile and recommendation data.

tasks.description: Analyze the viewing history and identify the primary genres the user watches.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the user primarily watches historical dramas and documentaries.

tasks.description: Trigger a full refresh of the user's recommendation profile to re-calibrate the algorithm.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully initiates a profile refresh.
